int gm_send_and_receive_message ( int  portno,
const char *  hostname,
gchar *  msg,
void(*)(gchar *)  callbackfunc 
)

connects to gappman and sends a message and may receive one or more answers.

Parameters:
portno portnumber gappman listens to
hostname servername of host that runs gappman
msg the message that should be sent to gappman
callbackfunc callback function that should handle each message received from gappman. If NULL no messages will be received.
Returns:
integer value as defined in libs/generic/gm_generic.h
